## SchemaDef type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type SchemaDef<T> = Omit<T, keyof BasicMetaData> extends {
    const: infer U;
} ? T & BasicMetaData<U> : T extends {
    enum: infer U;
} ? T & BasicMetaData<ArrayElement<U>> : T extends {
    type: infer U;
} ? T & Match<U, SchemaDefMap<T>> & Omit<BasicMetaData<SchemaInstanceType<T>>, "default"> & {
    default?: SchemaInstanceType<T> | Fn.Callable<{
        return: SchemaInstanceType<T>;
    }>;
} : SchemaInferBase;
```
